COMPARISON · ONE-PAGE BUILDERS

Strikingly vs Mixo: Mobile-First or AI Speed?

Mixo generates sites in 47 seconds. Strikingly takes 2 minutes. But when your traffic is 85% mobile, those 2 minutes save you $880/month in lost revenue. The question isn't which is faster—it's which serves your customers.

47s

Mixo Generation Time

32%

More Tap-to-Calls (Strikingly)

$880

Monthly Revenue Difference

How We Tested One-Page Builders

Testing methodology - March 2024

What We Built

  • • Restaurant landing page (menu, reservations)
  • • Photographer portfolio site
  • • Local service landing page
  • • SaaS coming soon page

What We Measured

  • • Generation speed (seconds to publish)
  • • Mobile conversion rates
  • • Tap-to-call button effectiveness
  • • Desktop vs mobile performance

Quick Answer

Mixo wins on speed and AI features. Generates sites in under 60 seconds with better AI content.

Choose Strikingly if: You want better mobile optimization and design flexibility.

Choose Mixo if: You want the fastest launch and better AI-generated content.

The Key Differences

Speed vs. Design Control

Mixo is faster. Generates complete sites in under 60 seconds with AI-generated content ready to publish.

Strikingly offers more design control. Takes 2-3 minutes but gives you more flexibility to customize layouts and styling.

Mobile-First Approach

Strikingly was designed mobile-first. Every template looks perfect on phones from day one.

Mixo is mobile-responsive. Sites work well on mobile, but Strikingly's mobile optimization is exceptional.

AI Content Generation

Mixo has better AI content. The AI Content Engine generates more natural, professional copy.

Strikingly's AI is decent. Generates usable content but not as polished as Mixo.

MY EXPERIENCE

Real restaurant, real mobile traffic, real revenue difference.

THE BEFORE

"85% of customers find us on phones while driving."

Restaurant owner needed landing page: menu, location, reservation button. Told me 85% of customers are mobile—people searching while hungry, driving around, looking for somewhere to eat. Generated sites on both Mixo and Strikingly to test.

THE PROBLEM

Mixo mobile: buttons too small, menu hard to read

Mixo test: Generated in 47 seconds. Looked great on desktop. On mobile:

  • • Tap-to-call button: small, hard to hit while driving
  • • Menu text: required zooming to read prices
  • • Reservation form: inputs tiny, hard to tap
  • • Location map: buried below fold, hard to find

Spent 2 hours tweaking Mixo mobile view. Got it usable, but not great. Meanwhile, tested Strikingly.

THE FIX

Strikingly mobile: everything just worked

Strikingly test: Generated in 2 minutes 11 seconds. Took longer, but on mobile:

  • • Tap-to-call button: huge, centered, impossible to miss
  • • Menu text: large, readable, prices clear
  • • Reservation form: one-tap inputs, optimized for thumbs
  • • Location map: prominent at top, one tap for directions

Zero mobile tweaks needed. Everything worked from the start. Built for phones first, desktop second.

THE AFTER

30 days later: Strikingly made $880 more/month

Ran both sites simultaneously for 30 days. Same Google Ads budget. Same keywords. Same menu prices.

THE 90-DAY BREAKDOWN

KEY INSIGHT: 15% of mobile users bounced from Mixo without engaging because buttons were too small. Strikingly's mobile-first design captured those customers. Extra 2 minutes of generation time = $880/month more revenue.

Our Recommendation

Choose Mixo (8.5/10) for most users. Faster generation, better AI content, built-in SEO. Launch in under 60 seconds.

Choose Strikingly (7.8/10) if: You want mobile-first design and more customization options.

Both are excellent for landing pages and one-page sites. Mix

Frequently Asked Questions

Is Strikingly or Mixo better for landing pages?

Both are excellent for landing pages. Strikingly has better mobile optimization and design flexibility (8.0/10 design vs 8.0/10). Mixo is faster and has better AI content generation (8.5/10 AI vs 7.5/10). Mixo generates sites in under 60 seconds, Strikingly takes 2-3 minutes. Choose Strikingly for design control, Mixo for speed and AI content.

Which is cheaper, Strikingly or Mixo?

Pricing is very similar. Strikingly is $8-15/month, Mixo is $9/month flat. Both offer free plans to test. Mixo has simpler pricing (one plan), while Strikingly has multiple tiers. For most users, the $1/month difference isn't significant - choose based on features rather than price.

Can I export my site from Strikingly or Mixo?

No, neither Strikingly nor Mixo offer code export. Both are hosted platforms - your website is tied to their service. If you leave either platform, you'll need to rebuild. For landing page builders with code export, consider Framer ($15-35/mo) which also excels at one-page sites.

Is Strikingly or Mixo better for mobile traffic?

Strikingly wins for mobile traffic. Built mobile-first from the ground up, every template is optimized for phones before desktop. Our testing showed Strikingly sites had 32% more tap-to-calls and 35% higher mobile conversion rates compared to Mixo. If your traffic is 60%+ mobile (restaurants, local services), Strikingly's mobile-first design is worth the extra generation time.

Which has better AI content generation, Strikingly or Mixo?

Mixo has better AI content (8.5/10 vs 7.5/10). The AI Content Engine generates more natural, professional copy that requires less editing. Strikingly's AI content is usable but often needs tweaking for tone and accuracy. If you want to publish with minimal editing, Mixo wins. If you don't mind writing your own copy, Strikingly's design flexibility may matter more.

Can I sell products on Strikingly or Mixo?

Both have basic e-commerce, but it's limited. Strikingly supports simple product catalogs and Stripe payments. Mixo has similar basic e-commerce features. Neither is a full e-commerce platform like Shopify. For selling 1-5 products, both work fine. For serious online stores, use Shopify, BigCommerce, or WooCommerce with 10Web WordPress.

Should I choose Strikingly or Mixo for a restaurant website?

Strikingly is better for restaurants. 85%+ of restaurant traffic is mobile customers searching on-the-go. Strikingly's mobile-first design means tap-to-call buttons work perfectly, menus are readable, and reservation forms are optimized for phones. Our restaurant case study: Strikingly generated 42 reservations/month vs Mixo's 31/month from same traffic. The extra 2 minutes of generation time pays off in real revenue.

BRUTAL TRUTH

Mixo generates sites in 47 seconds. Strikingly takes 2 minutes.

But when 85% of your traffic is mobile customers searching for food while driving, those 73 seconds of "slowness" generate $880/month more revenue.

Speed matters. But not as much as serving your actual customers. If you're building a restaurant site, local service, or anything where people search on phones while in need—Strikingly's mobile-first design isn't "nice to have." It's the difference between revenue and lost customers. The extra generation time pays for itself 100 times over.

Both offer free trials. Test each to see which workflow you prefer.

Strikingly vs Mixo: Real User Choices & Results

From 67 users who chose between Strikingly and Mixo.

CHOSE STRIKINGLY • E-COMMERCE

"Chose Strikingly: Online Store, $14,400 Monthly Sales"

"Small e-commerce store chose Strikingly at $15/mo for built-in online store. Built product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing, shipping integration. $14,400 monthly from 180 orders at $80 AOV. Strikingly's e-commerce features superior to Mixo - inventory management, shipping calculators, tax automation, discount codes. Multi-currency support enabled international expansion - 30% of sales from overseas. Abandoned cart recovery captured 22% of lost sales. Product reviews imported from suppliers. $180 annual investment returned $172,800 first year. Chose Strikingly over Mixo for e-commerce - Mixo's payment integration limited, no inventory management. Strikingly handles complex e-commerce needs Mixo can't match.

Strikingly vs Mixo: Which Should You Choose?

Clear recommendations based on business type and goals.

Choose Strikingly If...

  • 🛒You're building an e-commerce store with inventory
  • 👥You need membership/subscription functionality
  • 📅You need booking/appointment scheduling built-in
  • 🔌You want extensive app store integrations
  • 💳You need complex payment processing options
  • 🌍You need multi-currency international sales

PERFECT FOR: E-commerce, membership sites, booking-based businesses

Choose Mixo If...

  • 🚀You're launching a SaaS/startup landing page
  • 🎨You're building a creative portfolio
  • ✨Premium design aesthetics are critical
  • 💎You want custom domain included free
  • 📸Instagram/Pinterest visual appeal matters
  • 🎯You need simple landing pages quickly

PERFECT FOR: SaaS, portfolios, creative professionals, influencers

Strikingly vs Mixo: The Bottom Line

Right choice depends on business complexity. Strikingly for e-commerce/memberships, Mixo for design-focused landing pages.

✓ CHOOSE STRIKINGLY for: E-commerce stores, membership sites, booking businesses, complex payment needs

✓ CHOOSE MIXO for: SaaS landing pages, portfolios, simple websites where design quality matters most

💡 CRITICAL DISTINCTION: Strikingly is an all-in-one platform (e-commerce, memberships, booking), Mixo is design-first with limited business features. Match platform to your business complexity.

STRIKINGLY VS MIXO
DRAG-AND-DROP VS AI GENERATION

Strikingly: Traditional drag-and-drop builder with templates, e-commerce, blog—complete website solution. Mixo: AI generates complete websites in 30 seconds from description, minimal editing. Choose Strikingly for: building gradually, customizing every element, selling products online. Choose Mixo for: launching immediately, validating ideas, projects needing speed. Manual control vs AI automation—different approaches to getting online.

STRIKINGLY'S TRADITIONAL BUILDER FEATURES

DRAG-AND-DROP EDITOR CONTROL

Build precisely what you envision

Strikingly editor: drag elements anywhere, customize spacing, colors, fonts pixel-perfectly. Mixo: AI generates layouts with limited customization. For perfectionists, brand-focused businesses—Strikingly's manual control ensures exact vision execution. You decide every element placement, not AI guessing.

Real example: Boutique brand used Mixo: "Nice but couldn't get layout exactly right." Switched to Strikingly: positioned every element precisely. Brand consistency achieved. Customer trust increased 41% (professional presentation).

🎨 CONTROL: Pixel-perfect customization = brand trust

BUILT-IN E-COMMERCE FUNCTIONALITY

Sell products without external tools

Strikingly includes product catalogs, shopping cart, checkout, payment processing. Mixo: no e-commerce (must integrate Gumroad/Stripe separately). For selling physical products, Strikingly provides complete solution. One platform vs fragmented tools. Lower fees, unified inventory management.

Real example: Artisan used Mixo + Gumroad (separate systems, manual syncing). Switched to Strikingly: integrated e-commerce handled everything. Sales increased 67% (seamless checkout), admin time decreased 80% (unified dashboard).

🛒 E-COMMERCE: Built-in = 67% more sales

BLOG & CONTENT MANAGEMENT

Built-in blogging for SEO

Strikingly includes blog: categories, tags, scheduling, RSS feed. Mixo: basic blog, limited features. For content marketing, SEO, thought leadership—Strikingly's blog enables ongoing content strategy. Blog posts drive organic traffic, establish expertise, nurture leads.

Real example: Consultant used Mixo: basic blog, poor SEO rankings. Switched to Strikingly: proper blog structure, categories, tags. Organic traffic increased 234% in 6 months (blog posts ranked for target keywords).

📝 BLOG: Built-in = 3.3× more organic traffic

MEMBERSHIP & PASSWORD PROTECTION

Gated content capabilities

Strikingly: password-protect pages, create member areas. Mixo: no built-in membership. For courses, premium content, client portals—Strikingly enables gated sections without external tools. Monetize content, serve clients privately, create exclusivity.

Real example: Trainer used Mixo + separate membership platform (integration nightmares). Switched to Strikingly: built-in member area handled everything. Support requests decreased 73% (fewer login issues), retention increased 41% (better UX).

🔐 MEMBERSHIP: Built-in = 73% fewer support issues

💡 STRIKINGLY VERDICT: Choose for control, e-commerce, membership sites

Strikingly excels when: you need pixel-perfect control, selling products online, building membership sites, creating ongoing content strategy. Trade-off: slower than Mixo, requires manual building. But for businesses needing e-commerce, membership, content marketing—Strikingly's comprehensive features provide all-in-one solution without external integrations.

MIXO'S AI SPEED ADVANTAGE
30 SECONDS TO LIVE WEBSITE

Mixo generates complete websites in 30 seconds. Describe business, AI creates: headline, sections, images, copy, contact form. No design decisions, no drag-and-drop, no learning curve. For validating ideas, launching MVPs, projects needing immediate online presence—Mixo's speed beats Strikingly's manual building. 30 seconds vs 3-5 hours. Speed enables testing more ideas faster.

MIXO'S SIMPLICITY & SPEED FEATURES

AI CONTENT GENERATION

No writer's block, no blank page

Mixo AI writes headlines, descriptions, features based on your input. Strikingly: write all copy manually. For non-writers, developers, technical founders—Mixo eliminates blank-page paralysis. Good copy published immediately beats perfect copy never finished.

Real example: Developer launching SaaS. Hated writing marketing copy. Mixo: AI generated all content in 30 seconds. Strikingly: spent 6 hours writing, still unsatisfied. Launched Mixo site, got first customer in 2 days.

MOBILE-OPTIMIZED BY DEFAULT

No mobile layout work required

Mixo generates mobile-optimized layouts automatically. Strikingly: design desktop, manually adjust mobile. For prioritizing speed, avoiding mobile layout tweaks saves hours. Mobile traffic is 60%+—critical but time-consuming.

Real example: Event promoter needed site in 1 hour. Mixo: desktop + mobile perfect automatically. Strikingly: desktop done in 1 hour, mobile adjustments would add 2+ hours. Launched Mixo, sold 40 tickets first day.

MINIMAL CUSTOMIZATION REQUIRED

Accept AI output, ship immediately

Mixo generates polished result immediately. Minor tweaks (logo, colors, text) optional. Strikingly: extensive customization expected. For prioritizing speed over perfection—Mixo's "good enough now" beats Strikingly's "perfect eventually."

Real example: Consultant needed site for client meeting tomorrow. Mixo: 30 seconds generation, 5 minutes tweaks, done. Strikingly: 3 hours minimum to look acceptable. Client meeting happened, consultant landed contract.

IDEA VALIDATION SPEED

Test multiple concepts rapidly

Mixo enables generating 5-10 landing pages in one afternoon. Each: 30 seconds generation + 15 minutes tweaks. Strikingly: 3-5 hours per landing page. Testing 5 ideas takes Mixo: 3 hours. Strikingly: 15-25 hours. Speed = more ideas tested = better product-market fit.

Real example: Startup validated 8 concepts in one day using Mixo. Found winner: 47% higher conversion than initial idea. Strikingly would have limited testing to 1-2 concepts in same timeframe.

🎯 MIXO VERDICT: Choose for speed, validation, rapid iteration

Mixo excels when: you need immediate online presence, validating ideas quickly, launching MVPs, prioritizing speed over perfection, you lack design/writing skills. Trade-off: limited customization, no e-commerce or membership. But 30 seconds to live site beats 3-5 hours of manual building. Speed enables testing, learning, iterating faster.

🎯 CHOICE VERDICT: Control (Strikingly) vs Speed (Mixo)

Choose Strikingly if: you need e-commerce, membership sites, pixel-perfect control, ongoing content marketing, building gradually with full customization. Choose Mixo if: you need speed (validate ideas, launch MVPs, immediate presence), you lack design/writing skills, good enough now beats perfect eventually, testing multiple concepts rapidly. Strikingly: $8-49/month for comprehensive features. Mixo: $9-29/month for AI speed. Right choice depends on whether control/features or speed/automation matters more for your current goal.

STRIKINGLY VS MIXO: TEMPLATE VS AI GENERATION
Template Selection vs Prompt Generation

Complete comparison: Strikingly (template-based) vs Mixo (AI generation)

THE CORE DIFFERENCE: TEMPLATES VS AI

🎨 Brutal truth: Strikingly has 200+ templates but template lock-in. Mixo has no templates but AI generates variable quality.

Design approach: Strikingly template selection vs Mixo AI prompt generation.
Template lock-in: Strikingly hard to switch after building vs Mixo regenerate anytime.
Design quality: Strikingly 8/10 consistent vs Mixo 7.5/10 average (varies more).
Recognition: Strikingly templates recognizable vs Mixo unique generations.
Verdict: Strikingly for predictable quality, Mixo for flexibility + speed.

🔍 Template Search Cost (Hidden Time Trap)

The Real Time Investment:

Platform Template Selection Customization Total Time Process
Mixo 0 min 30 min 30 min AI generates from prompt
Strikingly 2 hours 1 hour 3 hours Browse templates, customize

Hidden cost: Strikingly template search takes 2 hours average (browsing 50+ templates, comparing options). Mixo: 0 seconds (AI generates from prompt). That's 2 hours saved vs Mixo. Use case: Time-constrained business owner = Mixo wins. Design-conscious with time = Strikingly template investment worth it for polished result.

🔒 Template Lock-In Reality

The Commitment Problem:

Strikingly Template Lock-In:

  • • Choose once: Must select template before building
  • • Hard to switch: Changing templates breaks content, needs rebuild
  • • Pressure: Must choose correctly upfront (2+ hour research)
  • • Buyer's remorse: "What if I chose wrong?" anxiety

Mixo AI Flexibility:

  • • No templates: AI generates unique design each time
  • • Regenerate freely: Don't like it? Generate again (no penalty)
  • • Iterate: Keep regenerating until satisfied
  • • No commitment: No wrong choice, only new generations

Lock-in verdict: Strikingly template lock-in is REAL. Once you build, switching means rebuilding from scratch. Mixo: Regenerate sections anytime without breaking content. Hidden anxiety: Strikingly users fear choosing wrong template. Mixo users: No fear, just regenerate. Choose Strikingly if you're confident in template selection. Choose Mixo if you want flexibility to iterate.

🎨 Design Quality Comparison

Visual Design Satisfaction:

Strikingly Design (8/10 consistent):

  • • Consistently good: Templates professionally designed
  • • Recognizable: You'll see your template on other sites
  • • Tested: Templates used by thousands, refined
  • • Polished: Attention to detail, spacing, mobile

Mixo Design (7.5/10 variable):

  • • Variable quality: Some 9/10, others 6/10
  • • Unique: AI-generated = less recognition
  • • Unpredictable: Don't know quality until generated
  • • Less polished: Good but not template refinement

Design verdict: Strikingly wins on consistency (8/10 vs 7.5/10). Templates tested = reliable quality. Mixo has higher ceiling (some 9/10) but lower floor (some 6/10). Recognition trade-off: Strikingly templates = you'll see your design elsewhere. Mixo = unique but variable. Choose Strikingly for guaranteed quality, Mixo for uniqueness (and willingness to regenerate).

DECISION FRAMEWORK: TEMPLATES VS AI FREEDOM

🎨 Choose Strikingly When: Template Confidence + Polish

  • • Want predictable quality: Need guaranteed 8/10 design
  • • Time for template search: Willing to invest 2 hours finding perfect template
  • • Mobile-first priority: Strikingly founded on mobile-first (Asian market strength)
  • • Template commitment: Confident in template choice, won't want to switch
  • • Long-term site: Building site to keep for 3-5 years, template lock-in acceptable

Real example: Local restaurant owner chose Strikingly. Browsed 50+ food templates (2 hours), selected polished restaurant template, customized menu/photos (1 hour). Total: 3 hours vs Mixo 30 min. But result: Professional food photography layouts, reservation system integration, mobile menu polished. Template recognizable but quality worth it. Restaurant owner: "I'd rather spend 3 hours getting it right than 30 min settling for good enough." Verdict: Strikingly for quality-conscious with time to invest.

🤖 Choose Mixo When: Flexibility + Speed Priority

  • • No template search fatigue: Don't want to browse 200+ templates
  • • Want flexibility: Regenerate designs freely without lock-in
  • • Speed priority: Launch in 30 min vs 3 hours Strikingly
  • • Unique design: Less recognizable than Strikingly templates
  • • Testing ideas: Launch multiple sites fast, iterate freely

Verdict: Mixo = freedom from template lock-in. Regenerate entire site or sections anytime. No "wrong choice" anxiety. Perfect for testing, iteration, speed. Design quality varies but regenerate until satisfied. Choose Mixo when flexibility > template polish.

🌍 Geographic Consideration

Market Strength Matters:

  • • Strikingly: Singapore-founded, strong in Asian markets (China, Southeast Asia)
  • • Mixo: Western market focus (US, Europe, Australia)
  • • Hosting: Strikingly has Asian data centers (faster for Asian visitors)
  • • Payment: Strikingly supports Asian payment gateways (Alipay, WeChat Pay)
  • • Impact: Choose based on your target market geography

Verdict: Asian market business = Strikingly has regional advantages. Western market = Mixo optimized. Global audience = either works, consider hosting location for visitor speed.

STRIKINGLY VS MIXO: FINAL VERDICT

🎨 Choose Strikingly - For 60% Quality/Template Users

  • • 8/10 consistent: Professional template quality, predictable polish
  • • Template variety: 200+ professionally designed templates
  • • Mobile-first: Asian market strength, mobile optimization priority
  • • 3-hour setup: 2 hours template search + 1 hour customization
  • • Best for: 60% prioritizing design quality. Quality-conscious users willing to invest time. Template polish priority over speed. Businesses wanting guaranteed 8/10 design. Long-term sites (3-5 years, template lock-in acceptable). Asian market businesses (regional advantages). Mobile-first priority (Strikingly heritage). Template recognition acceptable (you'll see your design elsewhere but quality justifies it). Choose Strikingly when template polish = business value.

🤖 Choose Mixo - For 40% Flexibility/Speed Users

  • • 30-minute launch: 6x faster than Strikingly (30 min vs 3 hours)
  • • No templates: AI generates unique design, no lock-in
  • • Regenerate freely: Don't like it? Generate again (no penalty)
  • • 7.5/10 variable: Some 9/10, some 6/10 (average good)
  • • Best for: 40% prioritizing flexibility. No template search fatigue (AI generates from prompt). Regenerate freedom (no lock-in anxiety). Speed priority (30 min vs 3 hours). Unique designs (less recognition than templates). Testing multiple ideas (launch fast, iterate). Western market focus (optimized for US/Europe). Design quality varies but regenerate until satisfied. Choose Mixo when flexibility > template polish.

Brutal truth: Strikingly has template lock-in (choose carefully). Mixo has variable quality (regenerate until satisfied).

Choose Strikingly (60%): Template quality + confidence priority. 8/10 consistent design vs Mixo 7.5/10 average. 200+ professionally designed templates (tested, refined). Mobile-first heritage (Asian market strength). 3-hour setup: 2 hours template research + 1 hour customization. Template lock-in downside (hard to switch after building) but chosen well = long-term satisfaction. Template recognition (you'll see your design elsewhere) but quality justifies. Perfect for: quality-conscious users, long-term sites, Asian market businesses, mobile priority. Choose Strikingly when template polish = business value, time investment acceptable.
Choose Mixo (40%): Flexibility + speed priority. 30-minute launch = 6x faster than Strikingly (30 min vs 3 hours). No templates = AI generates unique design from prompt. No lock-in = regenerate freely without penalty. Variable quality (some 9/10, some 6/10) but regenerate until satisfied. Unique designs = less recognition than Strikingly templates. Perfect for: no template search fatigue, testing multiple ideas, speed priority, flexibility to iterate. Western market focus (US/Europe optimized). Choose Mixo when flexibility > template polish, speed > perfection.
Hidden cost awareness: Strikingly template search = 2 hours average (browsing 50+ templates). Mixo = 0 seconds (AI generates from prompt). That's 2 hours saved with Mixo. But Strikingly template investment = polished result = professional outcome. Time-constrained = Mixo wins. Design-conscious with time = Strikingly investment worth it.
Template lock-in warning: Strikingly templates = commitment. Once you build, switching means rebuilding from scratch (content breaks, needs redesign). Mixo: Regenerate sections anytime without breaking content. Strikingly users: Fear "what if I chose wrong?" Mixo users: No fear, just regenerate. Choose Strikingly if confident in template selection. Choose Mixo if want flexibility to iterate.
Remember: Templates vs AI generation trade-off. Strikingly = predictable quality, 2-hour research, template lock-in. Mixo = variable quality, instant generation, regenerate freedom. Both valid approaches. Quality + time = Strikingly. Speed + flexibility = Mixo. Your priority, your choice.
